DOC.brief_title: The Effect Oxygen Exposure During Newborn Resuscitation Lung Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Immediately prior birth , preterm infant ( < = 32 week gestation ) randomize one three group : 1 . Low Oxygen Burden ( LOB ) - initiation resuscitation 21 % 02 , II . Moderate Oxygen Burden ( MOB ) - initiation resuscitation 100 % 02 III . High Oxygen Burden ( HOB ) - 100 % 02 used entire resuscitation . A pulse oximetry monitor connect probe infant 's hand measure transcutaneous hemoglobin saturation oxygen ( Sp02 ) . Adjustments inspire oxygen concentration make every 15 second infant LOB MOB group achieve target Sp02 range 85-92 % . Resuscitation otherwise proceed per standard care . The intervention end upon arrival neonatal intensive care unit .
